channel.title: 🔥 Open Data hot twitter posts | by onData
channel.description: Tweets about open data, which have received at least 10 hearts or retweets, in many languages

item.title: #es @ 1436162574454857734
item.description:
@cristianvaldez5 @EmmanuelSDS @TheEconomist Irónico que seas físico/matemático y ni siquiera verifiques el nivel de datos abiertos y metodología del estudio y en cambio te guíes por tu sesgo de confirmación.
En fin.

item.title: #en @ 1436107645929222150
item.description:
This is an important point for other school districts to consider— choosing the wrong age threshold will undermine any school-based vaccination requirement. @LASchools did it right, here’s why: 12+ years ➡️ 50% of all students 16+ years ➡️ 13% of students
https://t.co/FIiHbEyZCC https://t.co/eZ4ZX9j7P0 https://t.co/6DZFE92y5I

item.title: #en @ 1436076711800676359
item.description:
FinMango Awarded $50,000 Grant from @GoogleHealth to Continue Collaboration on the COVID-19 Open Data Project.
The project is the world's most comprehensive COVID-19 dataset; tracking sub-national level data for 20k+ distinct locations in 190+ countries. https://t.co/2A8iyaPbTX https://t.co/1brCxGyxGC

item.title: #pt @ 1436068933602271237
item.description: Por onde passa @fecampa fortalece a luta pela transparência pública, pela ampliação das políticas dados abertos e pela inovação pública. Que sorte a nossa tê-la nessa comissão do TSE. https://t.co/SwJIqgEmT8

item.title: #en @ 1436047122357374988
item.description:
For 20+ years, Lincoln PD has been surveying citizens after they interacted with officers (e.g., cited, arrested, involved in an accident, or victim of select crimes).
Are there any other agencies with so many years of data on community perceptions?
https://t.co/HzDZTmr4lT https://t.co/eVxMaI9wTg

item.title: #en @ 1436044658396835842
item.description: In an enthusiastic and accessible way, I'll be sharing my decade long experience on the role of data in historical and social sciences. From basic data workflows, to global collaboration, from dirty excel files on a USB-drive to FAIR Linked Open Data on the Web. Hope to see you! https://t.co/JGnOsgUUGN

item.title: #en @ 1436043239681773579
item.description:
Realizing these days that my biggest strength is also my biggest weakness, I'm loyal AF to anyone who has gone to bat for me. This creates challenges when I get pulled in too many directions but also keeps many doors open.
I know others probably have similar dilemmas.

item.title: #en @ 1436040830519848964
item.description: One of the pillars of #CCoMP is its commitment to open data and open science. And I'm so looking forward to working with YOU, our diverse science community, on new data streams, integration opportunities, and collaborative projects this center will yield!

item.title: #it @ 1436033556262834178
item.description:

#datiBeneComune
https://t.co/yj2j420A0v

item.title: #es @ 1435962879660994564
item.description: Vacunación en México: ¿qué nos dicen (y que esconden) los datos? - Animal Político Vamos lento. No hay datos abiertos, por lo tanto no hay transparencia. La única meta, el arbitrario objetivo presidencial de “al menos una sola dosis” a >18 años en octubre. https://t.co/cCP9qtXg0C

item.title: #es @ 1435943572461604865
item.description:
En contraste con países como Colombia, Perú o Argentina— México no publica datos abiertos de vacunación, lo cual nos impide responder importantes preguntas.
Por qué los picos de vacunación se dieron en estas fechas? 🤔
Gracias por leer y compartir.
https://t.co/2eH1V19k5x https://t.co/vykXtOSX4y https://t.co/MFHRcRa5mj

item.title: #en @ 1435913345245143040
item.description: The idea behind #opendata is simple: an all-of-society approach to work towards a similar goal. That for Malaysia, is to win the battle against COVID-19. I'm thankful to MOH, @kharykj and his team for the opportunity and openness in collaborating with the open data community

item.title: #en @ 1435913343450030082
item.description: The devs behind are a team of 4 - all of us had built something with the MOH open data. We got together and worked with MOH over almost a month on building a transparent, easy to understand dashboard to better inform the public, orgs and policymakers on the state of the pandemic

item.title: #en @ 1435902449185869825
item.description:
To get the most out of your data for city planning, you need to use both automatic and manual counts. A data-oriented approach is not perfect, but it's close, says @VeroWatelle.
"OpenStreetMap and open data really is the future," confirms @Martijn_Ak. 🗺️🚲👏 #VC21 https://t.co/z9yCzAfxfV

item.title: #en @ 1435831780800487424
item.description: @quattrinia So sorry Andrea! I feel bad being paranoid while everyone preaches peace, love, and open data, but... each project represents *so* much effort. Clear publication credit is one of our few perks. We sure aren't in it for the money. Maybe "publish anyway" is the best advice?

item.title: #es @ 1435646764275666947
item.description: El presidente @lopezobrador_ dice que 60% de la población ya está vacunada contra #COVID19 Tal vez se refiere a mayores de 18 años, porque de la población total, solo 44% tiene al menos 1 dosis Aquí @GatitosVsDesig hablan sobre la falta de #DatosAbiertos y lo que esto significa https://t.co/7h6NqTG3zz

item.title: #en @ 1435645983690350618
item.description: I used to be worried about getting scooped, but it happens so often I can't worry about it anymore. These days I am working on taking it as a compliment to my own intellect.
